672  explicit ebooksave_activity_actor( const std::vector<item_location> &books,
673  const item_location &ereader ) :
674  books( books ), ereader( ereader ) {};
675 
676  activity_id get_type() const override {
677  return activity_id( "ACT_EBOOKSAVE" );
678  }
679 
680  static int pages_in_book( const itype_id &book ) {
681  // an A4 sheet weights roughly 5 grams
682  return std::max( 1, static_cast<int>( units::to_gram( book->weight ) / 5 ) );
683  };
684  static int total_pages( const std::vector<item_location> &books );
685  static time_duration required_time( const std::vector<item_location> &books );
686  static int required_charges( const std::vector<item_location> &books,
687  const item_location &ereader );
688 
689  void start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ ) override;
690  void do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who ) override;
691  void finish( player_activity &act, Character &who ) override;
692  void canceled( player_activity &act, Character &who ) override;
693 
694  std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> clone() const override {
695  return std::make_unique<ebooksave_activity_actor>( *this );
696  }
697 
698  void serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const override;
699  static std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> deserialize( JsonValue &jsin );
700 
701  private:
702  /**
703  * All remaining books left to scan.
704  * After a book is fully scanned to ereader, this list is modified so that the scanned book is removed from here.
705  */
706  std::vector<item_location> books;
707  item_location ereader;
708  /** How many books this activity has scanned to ereader so far. */
709  int handled_books = 0;
710  /** How much time is left on this book until it is fully scanned and we can move on to the next book. */
711  int turns_left_on_current_book = 0;
712 
713  static constexpr time_duration time_per_page = 5_seconds;
714  // Every 25 pages requires one charge of the ereader
715  static constexpr int pages_per_charge = 25;
716 
717  void start_scanning_next_book( player_activity &act );
718  void completed_scanning_current_book( player_activity &act, Character &who );
719 };
